price: ewig darin zu bleiben. Wie böse wird (dies) für sie am Tag der Auferstehung als Last sein!
arabic: خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهِۖ وَسَآءَ لَهُمۡ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ حِمۡلٗا

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: khālidīna fīhi wasāa lahum yawma al-qiyāmati ḥim'lan
